productType.title: 1. Product Type
productType.description: All products sold on CopyDrum are digital contents (PDF drum sheet music). These are non-physical electronic products available for immediate download after payment.

deliveryMethod.title: 2. Delivery Method
deliveryMethod.description1: After successful payment, files are available for instant download under
deliveryMethod.description3: If the download does not work, we provide reissued download links or resend the files manually upon request.

refundPolicy.title: 3. Refund Policy
refundPolicy.description: Due to the nature of digital products, refunds are not available once the file has been downloaded or accessed.
refundPolicy.exceptionNote: However, we offer refunds or exchanges in the following exceptional cases:

exceptions.exception1: Within 7 days of purchase if the file has not been downloaded
exceptions.exception2: Incorrect file provided or technical errors that make the file unusable
exceptions.exception3: Duplicate payments for the same product

customerProtection.title: 4. Customer Protection
customerProtection.description: We strive to resolve issues immediately:

protections.protection2: Reissue of download links if access issues occur
